Detailed Description

Implementation of species manipulation functions.

Function Documentation

int allocate_dam_species ( struct river_segment *  seg  ) 

Allocates the dam_species struct for this dam

Returns:
0 : OK -1 : error
note: since this routine occurs at very early init time, (before xv_main_loop) error messages are printed to stderr

Returns:
